Maps for the people and planet.
Join our work:

node.text:
Even so-called 'naturalists' like John James Audubon and Teddy Roosevelt advocated for wolf eradication because of the threat they posed to valuable livestock, ignoring the fact that the wolf's natural prey, such as bison, had all but been exterminated. This attitude enabled a centuries-long extermination campaign that nearly wiped out the gray wolf in the US by 1950.

Map: Wikipedia

Migration area of all 179 sharks Paths of six tagged sharks from the Bay Area Sạn Francisco Midway Island Hawaii 500 miles "White Shark Cafe" Source: Stanford University MERCURY NEWS'.

White Shark Café is the ocean's hottest club.⠀

Photo by The Decolonial Atlas on July 18, 2021. May be an image of map and text.

node.text: Poor countries are the front lines of climate disaster. So why does news only report on the flooding in Western Europe, but not, say, the devastating drought in Madagascar, the floods in Chad, the wind storm in the Gambia, or the forest fires in the Congo? Are those lives valued less?

node.text: The vast majority of people support a #4DayWorkWeek to reduce unemployment, cut emissions, and improve overall well-being. The only thing standing in our way are some capitalists who, frankly, don't know the meaning of work - truly super-villains. Let us rest!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Decolonial Atlas on July 13, 2021. May be an image of map and text that says 'Everett, C. et al. (2015). Climate, vocal folds, and tonal languages: Connecting the physiological geographic dots. .Tonal Language •Non-Tonal Language High Average Humidity Low Average Humidity'.

node.text: The level of moisture in the air affects the elasticity of our vocal cords. Singers can tell you that it's harder to carry a tune in a dry environment. Languages with complex tonality have generally not developed in very cold or dry climates, suggesting that human language is ecologically adaptive.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Decolonial Atlas in Uintah and Ouray Indian Reservation. May be an image of map and text that says 'Jenin Tubas Nablus Salfit Ramallah Jericho Jerusalem Bethlehem Hebron West Bank Uintah & Ouray Reservation'.

node.text:
Israel's annexation plan is a geographic mess, and that's by design. Checkerboarding is a colonial tool to create a complex jurisdictional landscape which ultimately constrains sovereignty, and allows settlers to appropriate more and more land. We've seen this before.

Left: The West Bank showing the Green Line and Palestinian Authority land in yellow.
Right: The Uintah and Ouray Indian Reservation in Utah showing tribal trust land in yellow.
